Title: [ANN] EcoPole - agricultural investment (Russia)
Body: Thank you for your opinion. If you ask me what is better, to invest in Bitcoin, Waves or ecopole? I'll answer of course invest to Bitcoin and Waves! Because this currencys will grow faster then ecopole. And I'm investing in Waves now too! I have Antminer and I change mined btc to waves and believe that Waves will be grow.  I think that Ecopole it is not about only cryptocurrencys. It is about our life, our food, our ecology, our children and our future. And for community it is opportunities to invest directly in the local farming without any borders. It can be not only our project. It can be any good project. And I ask you, what is your own opinion about it? Should you invest in usual people or not? Maybe should you invest in own project first? But what Your Project is?  Still now I had very small advertisement, only on the bitcointalk. So, we are still newbies and looking around, thinking, reading, speaking with community. Our capitalisation still is not so big.  https://wavesdesk.com/account/3PBWK2RVELHb3Qcd6XtWUjgZ653UTffSEss  I'm working right now to add some cryptocurrency from my side, because I think I understand the profit for me, for society and for investors.  Ok. It was lyric above.  The agriculture usualy it is about 20% percent of profit per year. And profit of bitcoin or waves is 400-800% per year, is not it? I would like to combine both profits and do the half of bitcoin|waves's profit for investors. Maybe more.  But if somebody happens and, oh no, bitcoin will be crushed by somebody our farm will be alive and will produce food and 20% profit per year every year . I think it is good investment to have some profit every year and save money in real property. Of course I beleive that with cryptocurrency all will be ok and our 20% profit will be grow because we will buy Waves on all profite. 20% * 400% - it is good money $). What do you think?  We are real, you can see our videos and we will do more videos and proof our reality. I guess now is good point to invest because I did big discount (45%) and I am working now to add more Waves to project.  Next step: airdrop on waves. If you want I could send you some EcoPole for free, please send me your waves wallet.

Author: rockminer1
Title: [ANN] EcoPole - agricultural investment (Russia)
Body: *** Website was closed *** Old Whitepaper *** Youtube *** Telegram ***  New Smartpaper   Dear community:  My name is Anton Pylaev and I want to present to ICO the EcoPole project developed by me and Eugene Polenov.  The project is aimed at investors interested in preserving their capital and strengthening the agricultural economy of Russia. Investors who understand the value of investments in environmental farming projects. We believe that the successful development of this project will provide our region with environmentally friendly farm products and will also stimulate the development of the "green" economy in Russia. We encourage miners and crypto-investors to study our project and invest in Ecopole at the initial stage, so that we can complete our plans.  What is this project about in brief? We want to organize the structure of a diversified enterprise using the positive experience of collective management. Using the most modern world technologies for mechanization of soil cultivation, control and preventive maintenance of fertility, storage, processing, logistics and sales of agricultural products, waste collection and processing. It will reduce the cost of the final product, while increasing the profitability of the enterprise and, as a consequence, the price of our tokens. These industries include:  Mechanization Warehouse infrastructure Crop production Olericulture Livestock farming Processing of products Horticulture Tourism Waste treatment  What stages have already passed and what are left?  We've bought a field of about 163 hectares We've received initial experience in managing the economy (5 years) We've got an apiary (4 years) We have started making hay (2 years) We have prepared the Roadmap and the Whitepaper We've created the website - www.ecopole.farm/en We have run the preICO on bitcointalk in Russian We did token on the Waves Platform We started the ICO on bitcointalk in English Repaired the old tractor MTZ 80 (3 may 2018) We are looking for tractor MTZ 82 (it's about 3352 waves or 2 btc)[/s] <- I bought Airdrop and sowing nectar sources <- did We have found seed investors on bitcointalk[/s] - is it real? We have reached agreements with advertising platforms about advertising the ICO  <- ICO is ended but thanks guys for free advertising We have launched the ICO on bitcointalk - ICO is ended We have collected money and completed the ICO - first second yes We have paid the work of seed investors Yes. As the first seed investor I invested in ecopole project about 13500 euros and have profit in crypto and foods (vegetables, milk, goat cheese right now because invested in 5 cryptominers too. We have started the implementation of the project according to the plan described in the roadmap and whitepaper we farm some eco foods and bitcoins   Ok my dear. I'd like to restart project and change the rules. ICO was closed because our strategy was no good. But this site is forum for cryptoinvestors, isn't it? Please help me to create the new smartpaper (dezentralised whitepaper) to create new project for green Mother Land, animals, greens, people and you.  If you like this ideas please write your comments here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1D8fkZajtrEaEgHtUro3iEUS9nHDCUMNdHAlOmletaKc/edit?usp=sharing Thanks for veawing. Thank you God! Satoshi banzai!  My telegram for communication: @lokoroko  (my English is not so good, some times it needs the google translate)[/list]

Author: rockminer1
Title: [ANN] EcoPole - agricultural investment (Russia)
Body: Hello, dear community.  I want to draw your attention and discuss our project. I do not have a large budget and a team of specialists behind the shoulders, but there is an understanding that investment is a story not only about programmers and robots, but also about us, ordinary people.  With this project, I want to reveal the opportunities for direct investments in agriculture and ecology in Russia. I already defended my project for a month in front of the Russian audience. I used google translate to translate this discussion for you.  https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ru&tl=en&u=https%3A%2F%2Fbitcointalk.org%2Findex.php%3Ftopic%3D3075344c%3D3075344  I highly appreciate the investment opportunities of this forum and I will be pleased to hear your opinion about this project.  At the moment, I would like to add the project EcoPole to all sites where it is possible to advertise for free or inexpensively this ICO https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FOzqZLAvUHpfXwQfpYbD0IQzQ4Hh2DUkyjDr9JqURCk/edit#gid=0  Soon the first of May, the time to start plowing the land. Unfortunately, we do not have a tractor that could plow. The MTZ 80 tractor, which we have, can only mow the grass.  Any amount invested in our project will be used for the intended purpose. We are determined to play long and will invest our time and effort in the project, regardless of the outcome of the ICO.  https://ecopole.farm

Author: rockminer1
Title: [ANN] EcoPole - agricultural investment (Russia)
Body: Who is mr Polenov?  Yevgeny Polenov. 39 years. Father 4 children.  He began to work as a builder in 1997. From 1999 to 2004 - 5 years worked in South Korea in construction, where from the handyman he studied up to the master of the construction site. In Korea he took part in the construction of plants, created several plants a year. He worked in different brigades in Korea, as a reinforcer, concrete worker, welder, installer.  On his return from South Korea in 2005, he organized an enterprise with a staff of up to 200 people. And until 2012 he successfully managed the enterprise, until he sold in the SU-155 (business wife Luzhkov). This was one of the first in Ivanovo contract organizations involved in monolithic construction.  For 7 years the company built about 1600000 sq.m.  With money from the sale of the enterprise in 2013, he bought land about 163 hectares in the Ivanovo region and began to study farming. For 4 years he developed an apiary to 20 bee colonies. In 2015, I purchased equipment for mowing grass (paid off in 2 years). The complex is organized: honey, hay, milk.  The capitalization of the economy at the moment is 10 million rubles.  Eugene about himself: "Anton, you know. I do not rip off my head. I know the process organization formula. I have an organization in my blood. And in the head. I can organize almost any enterprise. I just know what to do! "  You can contact Evgeny here EvgeniyPolenov or in the telegram @EvgenyPolenov
